Text: There is a bug in this build and only vanilla minecraft loads up. To fix this, go to the folder you put your launcher in. Launch minecraft through the launcher once. Then navigate to "*your install folder*tempFTBBETAA" and open the zip file. Copy and replace the contents of this zip to "*your install folder*FTBBETAA". All the mods should load up nicely now.
Ugh, piratebay messed up the directories. The zip is in "*your install folder*\temp\FTBBETAA". Copy and replace its contents to "*your install folder*\FTBBETAA".
